mapper.select: SELECT * FROM order_detail WHERE email = #{email} order by indate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (detailnum, prodnum, email, prodname, image, quantity, price, totalprice) values (IFNULL((SELECT MAX(detailnum) FROM `order` where email = #{email}),1), (SELECT `prodnum` FROM product WHERE prodname = #{prodname}), #{email}, #{prodname}, (SELECT `image` FROM product WHERE prodname = #{prodname}), #{quantity}, #{price}, #{totalprice})
